content.html: Elon Musk u are a manipulat!ve person which is why a lot of people are aga!nst u owning Twitter, no-one is fighting against free speech & truth be told u purchasing Twitter is a m!splaced priority cos the world has far more pressing challenges u can help tackle with ur wealth.
